Module jtamaro
Package jtamaro.data

Interface Option<T>

public sealed interface Option<T>
Option type is used to handle errors.

  • Method Summary

  • Method Details

    • flatMap

      <S> Option<S> flatMap(Function1<T,Option<S>> f)
      Apply a function to this option.
      Returns:
      Returns the result of applying the given function to the value of this option if this option is non-empty.

    • map

      <S> Option<S> map(Function1<T,S> f)
      Apply a function to this option.
      Returns:
      Returns an option containing the result of applying f to this option's value if this option is non-empty.

    • fold

      <S> S fold(Function1<T,S> someCase, Function0<S> noneCase)
      Obtain a value depending on whether this option is empty or not.
      Returns:
      Returns the result of applying the someCase function to the value of this option if this option is non-empty or noneCase if this option is empty.

    • isEmpty

      default boolean isEmpty()
      Determine whether this option is empty.

    • stream

      default Stream<T> stream()
      Produce a stream.
      Returns:
      An empty stream if this option is empty or a stream with a single value if this option is non-empty.
